title: The Razing of the Id / The Chrietzberg Chronicles:
description: The Razing of the Id/the Chrietzberg Chronicles is an accelerated autobiography of certain years of the authors life as recounted to Jimmy, a quadriplegic boy. Larry's adventures as he investigates Indian legends and a lost love all play a part in this tale of victory of seemingly insurmountable odds.
author: Larry M. Binion
